text.section: The Tax Court shall appoint a clerk.
The clerk is entitled to the salary provided in the State budget.

section.section:
The clerk shall have custody of and keep as a public record:
a docket that is a full and accurate record of all proceedings in the Tax Court; and
a file of all the pleadings and exhibits in all proceedings in the Tax Court.
The clerk shall issue a subpoena as required under §§ 13-520 and 13-521 of this article.
The clerk shall perform other duties that the Tax Court assigns.

text.section: The clerk may administer oaths in connection with any proceeding in the Tax Court.
